en_text: Yeah, that's right.
jp_text: ああ そのとおりだ
google_translated: Oh, it's true

en_text: Are you here to avenge him?
jp_text: 仕返しにでも来たのか？
google_translated: Did you come back?

en_text: That means I was negligent in his oversight.
jp_text: 俺の監督不行き届きってことで 許してやってほしい
google_translated: I want you to forgive me by reaching my supervision

en_text: I owe you one after all this.
jp_text: 今回の件 借りにしておく
google_translated: I will borrow this time

en_text: If anything comes up,  you can always count on me.
jp_text: 何かあれば 俺様を頼ってくれていい
google_translated: If you have something, please rely on me

en_text: In that case, I'd appreciate it if you'd  enter a non-aggression pact with our nation.
jp_text: それなら 俺たちの国との不可侵協定を
google_translated: Then the invoice agreement with our country

en_text: That's all you want? Very well.
jp_text: そんなことでいいのか？ よかろう
google_translated: Is it okay?Guess

en_text: The Demon Lord... no...
jp_text: 魔王の… いや
google_translated: Demon King ... No

en_text: The Beastmaster of the Animal  Kingdom of Eurazania, Carrion,
jp_text: 獣王国ユーラザニア
google_translated: Beast Kingdom Urazania

en_text: swears on his name to never  raise a blade to your nation.
jp_text: 貴様たちに刃を向けぬと誓ってやる
google_translated: I swear to your blade

en_text: Thanks. all right.
jp_text: よし
google_translated: Good

en_text: Come on, we're out.
jp_text: ほら 帰んぞ
google_translated: I'm back

en_text: Uh, he's losing tons of blood!
jp_text: いっぱい血 出てますけど！
google_translated: I have a lot of blood!

en_text: Now, then...
jp_text: さてと…
google_translated: Well ...

en_text: I guess that's over.
jp_text: 終わったな
google_translated: It is over
